meanings.definition: The study and use of radiation in medical imaging.
meanings.sent1: Radiologies help doctors see inside the body.
meanings.sent2: She specializes in radiologies and helps diagnose illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The radiologies class was so interesting, it made me want to become a doctor!
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of radiologies was a shining light in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent5: Learning about radiologies made the medical procedures more understandable.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the use of radiation in the diagnosis and treatment of disease.
meanings.sent1: Radiologies play a crucial role in detecting illnesses early.
meanings.sent2: Doctors in radiologies work tirelessly to help patients get better.
meanings.sent3: The radiologies department had a 'radiant' reputation for their accurate diagnoses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, radiologies are like detectives solving mysteries inside the body.
meanings.sent5: The importance of radiologies cannot be overstated in modern healthcare.
